about.summary: Provides an easy way to report the results of ROC analysis, including: 1. an ROC curve. 2. the value of Cutoff, AUC (Area Under Curve), ACC (accuracy), SEN (sensitivity), SPE (specificity), PLR (positive likelihood ratio), NLR (negative likelihood ratio), PPV (positive predictive value), NPV (negative predictive value).

Provides an easy way to report the results of ROC analysis, including: 1. an ROC curve. 2. the value of Cutoff, AUC (Area Under Curve), ACC (accuracy), SEN (sensitivity), SPE (specificity), PLR (positive likelihood ratio), NLR (negative likelihood ratio), PPV (positive predictive value), NPV (negative predictive value).

name: r-reportroc
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '3.5' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-reportroc
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/reportROC_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/reportROC/reportROC_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 16d9d1032cfc4de25b23f686ec3e1379a38760bd81ac516fd013ae427e6f7bb8

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-proc
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-proc

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('reportROC')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('reportROC')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=reportROC
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: 'Provides an easy way to report the results of ROC analysis, including: 1. an ROC
    curve. 2. the value of Cutoff, AUC (Area Under Curve), ACC (accuracy), SEN (sensitivity),
    SPE (specificity), PLR (positive likelihood ratio), NLR (negative likelihood ratio),
    PPV (positive predictive value), NPV (negative predictive value).'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: reportROC
# Type: Package
# Title: An Easy Way to Report ROC Analysis
# Version: 3.5
# Author: Zhicheng Du, Yuantao Hao
# Maintainer: Zhicheng Du<dgdzc@hotmail.com>
# Description: Provides an easy way to report the results of ROC analysis, including: 1. an ROC curve. 2. the value of Cutoff, AUC (Area Under Curve), ACC (accuracy), SEN (sensitivity), SPE (specificity), PLR (positive likelihood ratio), NLR (negative likelihood ratio), PPV (positive predictive value), NPV (negative predictive value).
# License: GPL-3
# Imports: pROC
# LazyData: TRUE
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-07-21 03:42:12 UTC; dgdzc
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-07-21 06:30:02 UTC
